title: Cast from the Shadows
description:
Cast from the Shadows is a standalone novel within the Parkdale Series. 

Free from his father’s shadow, Landon has decided to hit the open road. What happens when a pretty girl hops in the car and invites herself along?


Dropping out of college and defying my father’s wishes should have been the most pivotal moment in my life.Deciding to take a cross-country road trip in a classic Mustang should have been a dream come true.But none of that mattered when a hauntingly beautiful girl hopped into my car and demanded to be taken away from her small-town life.She became my kryptonite.I should have kept driving. The two of us were too much alike— beaten down and broken by the world around us.Everything seemed as if we were headed for destiny…
… until we took a wrong turn and headed toward disaster instead.



If you like emotional, heart wrenching, small town love stories, you’ll love this road trip romance novel from Danielle Keil!
author: Danielle Keil
